title: Did McCawley Kolkin say that those responsible for the Devil's Hollywood wear shoes made of dead children?
subtitle: According to false news sites, the former children's star says Hollywood is run by demonic child molesters who kill children with their rituals.
author: David Emery
vclaim: Former child star McCulley Colkin said that Hollywood is run by demonic child molesters, one of whom boasts that his shoes are made of the skin of the dead child actress Heather O'Rourke.
